hero_titulo: Hi, I'm Your Name. Web Developer.
hero_subtitulo: I turn ideas into digital experiences that work. I help you create a website that reflects your brand and connects with your customers.
servicio_desarrollo_texto: Creation of unique, fast, and secure websites optimized for an exceptional user experience.
servicio_ecommerce_texto: Development of robust and easy-to-manage online stores that convert visitors into customers.
servicio_seo_texto: I improve your website's visibility so potential clients can find you on Google and other search engines.
footer_parrafo: Professional web development and design to help you grow.
